Company: Connextions, Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield of Indiana, Anthem Blue Cross Blue Shield of Ohio, Empire Blue Cross Blue Shield of Indiana
Description of incident: A Connextions employee used Social Security numbers from a number of other organizations for criminal activity.  At least four members of Anthem Blue Cross and Blue Shield were affected by the criminal activity.  The breach was reported on HHS as affecting 4,814 patients, but more were affected.
